flawed_nl_solution:
The temperature dropped 18 degrees because 80 -78.2 = <<80-78.2=18>>18
She planted 180 trees because 18 / 0.1 = <<18/0.1=180>>180
It cost $1080 to plant the trees because 180 x 6 = <<180*6=1080>>1080
#### 1080

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1.7999999999999972, not 18. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
